about_the_game:
Graffiti Battle, the adventure game. Play an aspiring graffiti artist on the road to fame.

State of the game

Graffiti Battle is in Early Access - this game is in active development.

About


The Graffiti Battle game features:

  • Achievements
  • Character creation
  • Character progression
  • Crafting
  • Fame / Ranking
  • Painting graffiti
  • Questing
  • Tutorial

Achievements

The game progression is tied to unlocking related achievements.

Character progression

The character progression mainly depends on fame, granting new levels upon passing thresholds.
  • Accumulating fame
  • Gaining skill points
  • Detailed stats system
  • Customizable outfits

Crafting

Use the crafting kitchen table at the player character home to cook rations, refreshments on the way around the world. The cooking ingredients can be bought at the local supermarket.

Fame / Ranking

Compete with other players for rank number #1! Fame is earned by painting, or by completing quests. Styles have different rarities and types, the amount of fame depends on it, i.e. a common tagg grants less fame than a throw-up, or piece.

Painting Graffiti

The Blackbook is a collection of all unlocked styles, ranging from simple Taggs, to quick throw-ups, and full fledged colorful pieces. To paint a style we first have to select it inside the Blackbook - click on it, and then depending on the spraycan color equipped we paint.

In order to paint, the player needs to stand in front of a surface - ideally in a 90 degree angle and equip a spraycan with enough color left. New blackbook styles are found, granted by completing quests, or by leveling.

Questing


Interactions with the game world may result in quest offers, solving them yields rewards.

Tutorial

The tutorial is the best way to learn the basic game functions.

name: Graffiti Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Play the Graffiti Battle action adventure game.
